author: Staff Reporter
text:
With a view to enlightening the public, especially the new voters, on the importance of exercising their voting rights, Kanyakumari Collector and District Election Officer Sajjansingh R. Chavan launched a signature campaign at the Collectorate on Wednesday.

A banner with the pledge, “I will cast my vote without fail, without any hesitation on May 16,” was kept on the Collectorate premises. Later Mr. Chavan flagged off an awareness rally on voting from the Collectorate in which over 500 students of S.T. Hindu College participated.

They carried placards with messages on the importance of voting. The rally went through Chettikulam and ended at the college.

District Revenue Officer S. Elango, Nagercoil constituency Returning Officer and Revenue Divisional Officer S. Madhiyazhagan, Assistant Returning Officer and Agasteeswaram Tahsildhar A.V. Murthy and folk artistes also participated in the rally.
title: Signature campaign, rally on voting held
